column5: This will be my 3rd trip to Lac Seul.Last year my wife and I took our Honeymoon there.Just booked a cabin for 4 weeks.I'm soooooo excited! My wife is already making grocery lists and doing meal planning.Going July 27th through August 24th.My English Cocker Spaniel ,Tuffy,has been glued to me since we made the decision to go.She went with us last year and had as much fun as we did.Bill
Where are you headed camp wise? We talked last winter if you remember.Pooch

Very nice- I can't wait to be able to have that much time up there(only 3-1/2 yrs not that I'm counting). I'm taking my 2 Golden Retrievers up in 2 weeks for their 2nd trip to Canada. I have a hard time going w/o them.
PoochWe're staying at Gawley's Little Beaver Lodge.
A bucket of cold water will take of old Tuffy...Kinda weird a dog would have as much fun on a honeymoon...whatever.
Blueberry pancakes for breakfast and Beer battered walleye in the evening.Can't wait.
And for dessert there's Tuffy to play with.

Last year in the evening my wife and I would sit outside,watching the fire.Tuffy started"retrieving" frogs,all delivered to hand,unharmed,as she is supposed to.The frogs got wise to this after a few evenings and vacated our area.Then it was toad "retrieving" until they vacated the area.Toads would cause her to sneeze.
Friend of mine has that prob with coke.. didn't quite get the message conveyed with character Gollum in Lord of the Rings
